alert.note: Alert for Brule (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:21PM MDT until June 24 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1020 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Francis Case, or near Chamberlain, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chamberlain around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pukwana and Kimball. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
